name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Opening montage with clips from song performances and a showcase of the 'Flower Stand' gifts from fans.
Continuous showcase of flower stands sent by various fan groups and individuals, accompanied by instrumental tracks.
Pre-show announcement by the venue staff, welcoming the audience and providing last-minute instructions before the start.

subtitles.original:
Flower Stand
フラワースタンド紹介

Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live “STELLAR into the GALAXY”
開演までしばらくお待ちください
SNSでの感想投稿OK
subtitles.english:
Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live “STELLAR into the GALAXY”
The show will start shortly. Please wait for a while.
Posting impressions on SNS is OK

subtitles.original: 本日は、星街すいせい 1st Solo Live “STELLAR into the GALAXY” Supported By Bushiroadにご来場いただきまして、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for attending Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live “STELLAR into the GALAXY” Supported By Bushiroad today.

subtitles.original: 大変長らくお待たせいたしました。
subtitles.english: Thank you for waiting so long.

subtitles.original: 本公演は間もなく開演いたします。
みなさん、一緒に盛り上がる準備はできてますか？
subtitles.english: Are you all ready to get excited together?

subtitles.original: ペンライトと拍手で応えてください！
subtitles.english: Please respond with your penlights and applause!

subtitles.original: 最後まで一緒に楽しみましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy it together until the end!
